p: A muscle cell line derived from a rhabdomyosarcoma SJCRH30, although less physiological, has been used to confirm that CHIKV is able to infect and replicate in muscle cells [ 96]. The same cell line was recently employed to assess CHIKV entry in muscle cells via macropinocytosis [ 105]. In another study, human muscle cell monolayer (RD cell line) showed to support CHIKV replication [ 97].
